name: Candy Chaos (UwU5)
description:
In this local multiplayer game you will have to be the one with more candies at the end of the time. 

In order to achieve it, you can either play safe (not spending candies and staying away from the other player) or play risky (spending candies to buy random items to disturb the other player and stole candies from them).

 It's up to you the way you battle!
